text: Gopal Gurung ( ( December 07, 1939 â€“ June 10, 2016) was a Nepali journalist, author, politician and futurist of global politics. He led the fight against the discrimination done by the Indo Aryan (Bahun and Kshetri) people to the indigenous Mongol people of Nepal. He was the founder president of Mongol National Organization (MNO) and the first pioneer of republican Nepal. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Futurists Category:Journalists Category:Nepalese politicians
title: Gopal Gurung
